name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE v. EASTERN AUTO CAR WASH, INC., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Eastern Auto Car Wash, Inc.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
ROBERTS, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE v. EASTERN AUTO CAR WASH, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed 10 Pa.Cmwlth. 207, 309 A.2d 611.
ROBERTS, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lewis H. Markowitz, Richard C. Fox, York, for appellant.
Guy J. DePasquale, Deputy Atty. Gen., Dept, of Revenue, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 277
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE v. EASTERN AUTO CAR WASH, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1974.
Decided July 7, 1975.
Rehearing Denied Sept. 26, 1975.
Lewis H. Markowitz, Richard C. Fox, York, for appellant.
Guy J. DePasquale, Deputy Atty. Gen., Dept, of Revenue, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
